title.rendered: RUNVA 13XP PREMIUM 12V WINCH WITH SYNTHETIC ROPE

content.rendered:
RUNVA 13XP PREMIUM 12V WINCH WITH SYNTHETIC ROPE

Runva 13XP Premium 12V Winch with Synthetic Rope available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

The Runva 13XP Premium is a very popular option, and is perfect for large heavy vehicles. Featuring a massive 13,000lb of line pull from the powerful and reliable 7.6HP motor. The gearbox is a three stage planetary setup with tough 228:1 gear ratio to handle the heaviest of recoveries. This model is the ideal choice for loaded up Landcruiser 79 Series all the way through to the American Dodge Ram, Tundra, F150 or anything else that requires some serious winch power! The Runva 13XP Premium is also compatible with a variety of other vehicles. This winch is quite large so check out the products dimensions to ensure fitment on your application.

This model has all of Runva’s Premium features built in. Feel confident in the most extreme conditions with full IP67 ingress protection. The brake is our most advanced Ratchet system which is located in the gearbox which is super efficient and able to hold without fail when you stop winching. Unlike the other traditional brake systems which uses brake pads, this will not wear out.

The clutch is easily engaged/disengaged via the Rotary Clutch system. The 13XP Premium is also fully compatible with our optional extra Runva Air Clutch for easy in-cab control.

Specifications:

  • Rated Line Pull: 13,000LB (5,897KG)
  • Motor: (12V) 5.6KW/7.6HP; (24V) 6.5KW/8.8HP
  • Gear Train: Full Steel 3 Stage Planetary
  • Gear Ratio: 228:1
  • Clutch Type: Stainless Steel Rotary Clutch
  • Clutch Handle Position: Gearbox can be Rotated
  • Brake: Automatic Ratchet Load Holding in Gearbox
  • Cable Type: Synthetic Rope
  • Cable Size: 11MM X 25M (25,250LB Load Rating)
  • Drum Size: 63MM X 217MM
  • Mounting Bolt Pattern: 254MM X 114.3MM
  • Overall Dimensions: 602MM X 160MM X 200MM
  • Remote Control: Heavy Duty Handheld + Wireless
  • Battery Leads: 2X 1.8M Heavy Duty Leads
  • Finish: Black Powder Coat
  • Warranty: Limited 5 Year Electrical and Lifetime Mechanical Warranty

To view the full range of recovery products available, CLICK HERE!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
